champ.name: Waiting Room
champ.desc: You are in a waiting room with sad leather couches and old magazines. There is a poster on the wall of a cat holding onto a tree branch and the words, "Glue Corp. holds the world together!"  There is a desk with a ringing phone on it. There is a door to the north.

object.spoon: This spoon is shiny and tiny. Could fit easily into a jar of peanut butter.
object.magazine: The cover reads, Glue Enthusiasts Quarterly, issue #352. The pages are stuck together firmly.
